mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.*, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1)/20 + 1) page FROM (SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY users.USER_NUM DESC) m ) WHERE page = #{nowPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_num, user_email, user_pwd, user_korname, user_firstname, user_lastname, user_birth, user_phone, tel, zip, address, add_detail, user_reg_date, grade) VALUES (User_Seq.NEXTVAL, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userEngFirstName}, #{userEngLastName}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userTel}, #{userZip}, #{userAdd}, #{userAddDetail}, SYSDATE, 1)
